ProductInfo.Features:
This fake dummy security camera with flashing red LED seems extremely authentic and simulates a functional camera
Comes with authentic video cable and metal bracket at more reasonable lower price than a real camera
Just set it up in a noticeable place and it will give the assumption that you have a complete video surveillance system in operation at your premises
This camera can be mounted on the wall or ceiling. The flashing LED light (Powered by 2 'C' Cell Batteries and Batteries Not Included)
Package including: 20 of dummy cameras and 20 of 3x2" security warning signs
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 20 Pack Fake Security Cameras Dummy Simulated Home CCTV Surveillance with Flashing LED Light WM3
